title: Digital clones made by AI tech could make Hollywood extras obsolete
description: Body scanning technology has become a central tension between actors and studio executives, as they face off in a strike that’s halted Hollywood.

title: Calling all nostalgic millennials: Neopets is reviving fantastical pet game
description: Neopets, which came out in 1999, is relaunching. Its new owners hope $4 million of investment and a new "World of Neopets" game will return it to its "glory days."

title: How to tell if a gadget is secure? Look for this new government seal.
description: Baby monitors, thermostats and smart TVs are security and privacy nightmares. The U.S. Cyber Trust Mark promises to help you ID the good ones — if industry doesn’t water down the standards.

title: The campaign against affirmative action shifts to corporate America
description: In a letter warning companies against "race-based quotas," Republican attorneys general cite the 2020 Microsoft pledge to double Black leaders and suppliers.

title: The best tech to have in a natural disaster
description: Your smartphone can be a lifesaver in an emergency situation like a heat wave or wildfire. Here is the tech you need to stay connected in a disaster.
